name: Linda Mott (LMOTT)
text: Very nice couple. Fair prices.

name: Ian D. Owens
text: Hinson recently provided excellent service for my residential project at a very competitive price. I would highly recommend them.

name: Alan Drinkard
text: Slappey Communication is doing a great job for us managing our internet services. They are always available and helpful when we have a problem. I have recommended they to others, as I know they do a good job.

resp.text: Thank you Alan! We love having you as a customer!

name: Sam Price
text: Working with Slappey has been one of the best decisions I've made in the past year.  Most companies I've worked with either don't service their own hardware (subcontract service out to a 3rd party) or have the expertise to make your phone work seamlessly with your other office technology. Slappey has been excellent as they service all of their own equipment. Plus, I now have a local person I can get on the phone rather than calling an 800 number and getting stuck in limbo.

name: miguel pacheco
text: Great Service, great people and wonderful leadership. I recommend this company  !

name: Pat Reid
text:
Great company and great people.

When working with a MSP often times you feel like a customer. With Slappey and their team I feel like I truly have a partner.

Ownership of a process to resolution is a great example where they shine.

Some folks look for the best price. Some the willingness to adapt to their business processes. I personally looks for integrity. Slappey has earned my business on all three points.

Patrick Reid
IT Manager
Royal Cup Coffee & Tea

name: Parish Vein Laser Aesthetics
text: Leslie was wonderful and so helpful in figuring out exactly what my business needed and the phones system they installed is fantastic. I would recommend Slappey to anyone who wants to replace or update their old phone systems.  The whole team at Slappey is available and very responsive to any questions.

name: Stephanie Moore Realtor
text: Excellent customer service and knowledgeable team!

name: mat d
text: Great company, great service.

name: Studio 21 Salon and Boutique
text:
I'm 7 months into a contract with this company for BASIC phone and internet service and the system is  down again today!!!  So far the service has been down a minimum of once a month since we signed our agreement.  Each time the service goes down it's always the fault of "AT&T" or "the equipment is faulty" or some other excuse.  To make matters worse EVERY time it goes down it's down for hours!!

Not once has there been any solutions offered until I started sending letters requesting to discontinue my service without penalty.  And here we are again...service down and the technician has no answers for me.

Do your business a favor....go anywhere else but this company for reliable phone and internet service...

resp.text:
Dana,

I'm so sorry to hear you are having a bad experience with Slappey.  This is certainly not the type of reference we've built in our 34 years of business and would like for you to have the same great experience all of our customers enjoy.  We understand that a redundant solution was offered to your company by our service team at no charge to you (so you aren't affected when AT&T has issues).  Perhaps you were not personally aware of this offer, but we would strongly encourage you to allow Slappey to implement this solution to make sure we eliminate the impact of any AT&T outages.

If you do need further assistance, our President is always willing to get involved and come meet you to discuss how we can make sure you have the great service that our company is founded on.

Thanks,
Slappey Team

name: Ruth Horridge
text: Awesome job on our website and local search submissions! Internet is faster at the house after only an hour and $50. Highly recommended.

name: Jon Greenwood
text: Awesome service, on-time, and affordable!

name: Jacob Mullins
text:
Moved into an apartment that forces us to use this provider. Wifi signal is janky at best, we're not getting the speeds we're paying for, and our internet goes out almost every hour. The most I got out of their office was "we'll send someone out when we can"
No time frame or anything. We have jobs so we can't plan to be home whenever you feel like showing up.
I'd rather use a company I know but this stupid apartment complex forced this one on us and it's been a nightmare so far

resp.text:
Hey Jacob, we are sad to hear about your negative experience. If you haven't done so already, please send us an email with your contact information and details about the problem to support@wavefly.com.  We will be sure to respond promptly and begin working towards a resolution. We understand connection issues can be frustrating to go through and deal with.

We look forward to the opportunity to resolve this for you.

name: Joshua Holmes
text: This group knows their stuff, simple as that.  Amazing support, rapid response and service has been fantastic.  Everyone is very friendly and oddly enough in this day and age, actually do what they say they will do.

name: Charles Wheeler
text: Great customer service.

name: Blake Svoboda
text: Great group of professionals that treat their clients like family.

name: Ashley Dortch
text: Good helpful people

name: michael raffield (Mike)
text: This company made a deal with me and we agreed to get an enclosed trailer I was suppose to buy as soon as they had the title the next day and  the next day I asked if it was still going to happen they said yes and then when I was suppose to get it they said they changed there mind not good business ppl at all don't recommend them to anyone

resp.text: Hi Michael, we are not in the trailer business, so I am not sure how you can judge our entire company and all the great people who work here based on some deal our executive team is not even aware of.

name: B.J Killings
text: He has a really good set up a lot of fish bait and live minnows you can't find them very often anymore reasonable prices and he's really nice

name: Debra Sue Loyd
text: Small yet adequately stocked. Lots of bait, minnow, crickets, shiners worms... helpful and informative about the area.

name: Gail Ezekiel
text: Tony was rude. No signs showing where you could park.

name: Julia Sibley
text: Awesome people

name: Nicole Maddox
text: Great place. MR. Tony is is also great a fixing computers! He has helped me many times!

name: Grant Marcum
text: Always great bait and tackle!

name: Brad Godwin
text: Best place in gantt to get your bait

name: Jessica Byrd
text: High quality worms.

name: Ronnie Grissett
text: Place for good bait..

name: T Moser
text: Good friendly service.

name: Rochele Turner
text: My family owns it
